name: Find the Differences Pro HD -Compare & Hunt Pocket Puzzle Strategy for iPad
name_original: Find the Differences Pro HD -Compare & Hunt Pocket Puzzle Strategy for iPad
description:
How fast can you find 5 differences between 2 photos?

A CASUAL CLASSIC GAME FOR YOU
• The clock is ticking – find those differences quickly
• Each mistake will cost you time against the clock
• You have 3 hints to help you along the way
• Save your score and compare with friends
• Hours of gameplay with tons of photos to keep you entertained

Follow us on twitter: @pocketzebra (http://twitter.com/PocketZebra)
